alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oxford, southern Androscoggin and northwestern Cumberland Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Naples, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewiston, Bridgton, Mechanic Falls, Naples, Gray, Raymond, Standish, Lisbon, Durham, Casco, Harrison, Hebron, Frye Island, Sebago, New Gloucester, Poland, Minot, Oxford and Otisfield. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 68 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Southern Oxford
